Create design

Source: R/8_fit_limma.R
create_design.Rd

Create design matrix for statistical analysis

create_design(
  object,
  subgroupvar = if ("subgroup" %in% svars(object)) "subgroup" else NULL,
  formula = default_formula(object, subgroupvar, fit = "limma"),
  verbose = TRUE
)

Arguments

object

SummarizedExperiment
subgroupvar

subgroup svar
formula

formula with svars
verbose

whether to message

Value

design matrix

Examples

file <- download_data('billing19.rnacounts.txt')
object <- read_rnaseq_counts(file, plot=FALSE)

#> 	Read C:\Users\abhagwa\AppData\Local\autonomics\autonomics\Cache/46a42cb13d9_billing19.rnacounts.txt
#> 		Infer subgroup from sample_ids
#> 		Infer subgroup from sample_ids
#> 		Preprocess
#> 			Keep 22855/56269 features: count >= 10 (~0 + subgroup)
#> 			pseudocount 0.5
#> 			cpm:    tmm scale libsizes
#> 				cpm
#> 			log2
unique(create_design(object))

#> 		Design: ~0 + subgroup
#>          E00 E00.8 E01 E02 E05 E15 E30 M00
#> E00_R1     1     0   0   0   0   0   0   0
#> E00.8_R1   0     1   0   0   0   0   0   0
#> E01_R1     0     0   1   0   0   0   0   0
#> E02_R1     0     0   0   1   0   0   0   0
#> E05_R1     0     0   0   0   1   0   0   0
#> E15_R1     0     0   0   0   0   1   0   0
#> E30_R1     0     0   0   0   0   0   1   0
#> M00_R1     0     0   0   0   0   0   0   1

object$subgroup <- 'billing19'
unique(create_design(object))

#> 		Design: ~1
#>        Intercept
#> E00_R1         1

file <- download_data('atkin18.somascan.adat')
object <- read_somascan(file, plot=FALSE)

#> 	Read: C:\Users\abhagwa\AppData\Local\autonomics\autonomics\Cache/2d00352b36b8_atkin18.somascan.adat
#> 		Retain 1125/1129 features: ~ColCheck %in% ~feature_quality
#> 		Log2 transform
unique(create_design(object))

#> 		Design: ~1
#>        Intercept
#> t0.C15         1
create_design(object, formula= ~ 0 + SampleGroup + Sex + T2D + age + bmi)
